H0.text: who has given the theory of unbalanced economic growth. Albert O. Hirschman's contemporary, Gunnar Myrdal

H1.text: who has given the theory of unbalanced economic growth. Ragnar Nurkse

H2.text: who has given the theory of unbalanced economic growth. Alexander Gerschenkron

H3.text: who has given the theory of unbalanced economic growth. Hirschman

A4.text: Ragnar Nurkse is considered the pioneer of Balanced Growth Theory

A5.text: Hirschman emphasized the need for unbalanced growth in his 1958 book The Strategy of Economic Development

A6.text: He argued that disequilibria should be encouraged to stimulate growth and help mobilize resources
